CustomField.description: Calculates the start date using FYXX format
CustomField.formula: If($CustomMetadata.PMT_Setting__mdt.Default.Start_Month_of_Fiscal_Year__c==1, DATE( VALUE(MID(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())),1,2) + MID(Fiscal_Year__c, 3, 2)), $CustomMetadata.PMT_Setting__mdt.Default.Start_Month_of_Fiscal_Year__c,1) , DATE( VALUE(MID(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())),1,2) + MID(Fiscal_Year__c, 3, 2))-1, $CustomMetadata.PMT_Setting__mdt.Default.Start_Month_of_Fiscal_Year__c,1) )
CustomField.label: Start Date
